p: Antibacterial activity was determined against five pathogenic bacteria Escherichia coli (ATCC 25922), Staphylococcus aureus (ATCC 25923), Bacillus cereus (ATCC 11778), Staphyloccocus epidermidis (ATCC 12228) and Staphylococcus albus (ATCC 8799) by the microplate assay method. Compound 208 showed weak antibacterial activity against Staphylococcus aureus with a MIC value of 20 Î¼g/mL. Ciprofloxacin was used as the positive control [ 66].
